title: Unable to Access PBE web pages

embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

body: It's been four days since I've been unable to access these pages to submit my application to join PBE. Is this intentional? Thanks!

replies.body: What error or issue do you receive when you try to access that link?

Hi, 

Sorry for the late reply. I receive an Error 500: something's gone hextechnically wrong. 

If it helps, I received an invite to create my pbe account about a year ago, but then never followed through. 

I would love to sign up and get testing if possible. 

Thanks! 

Rick

Gotcha. Try using a Virtual Private Network (VPN) such as [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) and let me know if you can access it now.
Idk whats wrong my account is inactive i think im banedðŸ˜ž
